## What's Changed
* Allow building with Zig 0.15 by @agagniere in https://github.com/Ratakor/axe/pull/1
* Remove `buffering` option as it is now included in the Writer interface
* Add flake.nix

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Ratakor/axe/compare/0.6.1...0.7.0
